This is Not Your Only Choice (Street Magazine)

This is Not Your Only Choice (Street Magazine)



How will you be using this?


Please allow 2-3 weeks for shipping. For Expedited Shipping call (651)-484-1040. Each publication costs 30 cents to design, print and ship. Select the suggested donation amount of $0.30 cents to help us with these expenses or $0 for no donation at this time. HLA services and materials are free for your use. If you choose to make a different donation and support our efforts with today’s request, please check out the DONATE page. Thank you.

View PDF

Description:

Get the number one resource for sidewalk counseling today! This innovative Street Magazine will engage a young woman in crisis pregnancy, present the facts about the child in her womb and reveal the gruesome realities of abortion−perfect for reaching a young woman entering Planned Parenthood. 24 pages.

Categories:

Issues Abortion
Type Publication
Target Age Teens, Young Adults, Adults
Target Audience Counselors, Pregnancy Resource Center, Pro-life Organizations, Sidewalk Counselors, Unintended Pregnancy
Language English
